homePage.title: Coca Cola Great Britain
homePage.subTitle: Founded in 1886 Dr John S Pemberton
homePage.description: The Coca Cola Company is the world's leading manufacturer, marketer and distributor of non-alcoholic beverage concentrates and syrups, and produces nearly 400 brands.

carousel.title: Foodmarks by Coca-Cola
carousel.body: 'Foodmarks represent destinations and experiences crafted with a blend of three essential elements: the perfect moment, the perfect meal, and an ice-cold Coca-Cola. Explore our map to uncover food landmarks in various cities and neighborhoods around the world.'

carousel.title: We're going naked for now
carousel.body: 'In a short UK trial, we're stripping off the labels from our Sprite bottles to help simplify the recycling process.'

carousel.title: Other Brands
carousel.body: View our other brands including Fanta, Oasis, and Schweppes!
